text: The Phoenix Suns are an American professional basketball team that plays in the National Basketball Association (NBA). They play in the Pacific Division of the Western Conference. The Suns play at Footprint Center, originally known as America West Arena and later as US Airways Center, Talking Stick Resort Arena, briefly as PHX Arena, and Phoenix Suns Arena. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Phoenix Suns website *BasketballBoards.net - Phoenix Suns Forum *Phoenix Suns at Yahoo! title: Phoenix Suns
